member.name: T:GardeningSystem.RestAPI.Controllers.ControllerHelperClass
member.summary: Obsolete class. Was used to get the id of a user from the http context.

member.name: T:GardeningSystem.RestAPI.Controllers.LoginController
member.summary: API controller to login (get a json web token) or to change the login information.

member.name: T:GardeningSystem.RestAPI.Controllers.ModulesController
member.summary: API controller to detele, change and get connected modules (valves and sensors).

member.name: T:GardeningSystem.RestAPI.Controllers.RegisterController
member.summary: Obsolete API controller. Was used to register a new user.

member.name: T:GardeningSystem.RestAPI.Controllers.SystemStatusController
member.summary: API controller to get the status of the basestation / irrigation system.

member.name: T:GardeningSystem.RestAPI.Controllers.WlanController
member.summary: API controller to get all reachable wifis and information wether the basestation is connected to a wifi or not.

member.name: T:GardeningSystem.RestAPI.Program
member.summary: This is not the starting point of the REST API. This class only exists to satisfy the error CS5001 ("There is no starting point for this program").

member.name: T:GardeningSystem.RestAPI.StartupRestAPI
member.summary: Class to startup the RESTful API.
